text:
Bugzilla is not a support forum.
Please use user mailing list.
Thank you

text:
Look at http://jmeter.apache.org/mail2.html

The user making list would be a good start to subscribe and ask your questions.

Have a look at the paragraph about asking smart question on the general guidelines section.

And please, don't use asap.
